snippet.title: DoubleShake | LRG3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab, shake, throw, and kick to save your islands from total chaos in this action-packed blast-to-the-past 2.5D Platformer inspired by some of our favorite 5th-generation games!

Limited Run and Rightstick Studios are proud to announce that DoubleShake will release in 2024! 

 #limitedrungames #doubleshake #platformer
